Title: Countrycide
Plot: Whilst investigating a group of unexplainable deaths in a village, the Torchwood team are separated. Discovering further, Jack, Gwen and Owen find a scared man, hiding from the thing responsible for the murders. But Tosh and Ianto go that one step extra, and locate the killer, who wants them as their next victims.
GuestStars: Kai Owen, Owen Teale, Maxine Evans, Calum Callaghan, Rhys op Trefor, Emily Bower, Robert Barton
